sentences.en: a car flashed past them at speed.
sentences.cn: 一辆车从他们身边疾驰而过。

sentences.en: Action had been taken to speed up the release of cheques.
sentences.cn: 已经采取行动加速支票的发放。

sentences.en: An ambulance sped her to the hospital.
sentences.cn: 一辆救护车把她快速送往医院。

sentences.en: Electric whisks should be used on a slow speed.
sentences.cn: 使用自动搅拌器时应该选用慢挡。

sentences.en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
sentences.cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

sentences.en: Her orbital speed must be a few hundred meters per second.
sentences.cn: 其轨道速度一定是在每秒几百米。

sentences.en: I got caught speeding on the A40 yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

sentences.en: I kept praying that the DJ would speed the music up.
sentences.cn: 我不停地祈望唱片播放师能加快音乐的节奏。

sentences.en: I'm not up to speed on these issues yet.
sentences.cn: 我对这些事情还不熟悉

sentences.en: It all started so promisingly when Speed scored a tremendous first goal.
sentences.cn: 比赛开始的时候形势大好，斯皮德以一记精彩的进球拔得头筹。

sentences.en: Its speed is probably in the neighbourhood of 380mph or even more.
sentences.cn: 它的时速大约达到了380英里，或者更快。

sentences.en: Many motor accidents are the result of unthinkingly mixing speed and alcohol.
sentences.cn: 许多机动车事故都是不计后果地酒后开快车造成的。

sentences.en: particles that travel at the speed of light
sentences.cn: 以光速运动的粒子

sentences.en: Speed was of the essence in a project of this type.
sentences.cn: 对于这种项目来说，速度至关重要。

sentences.en: The camera combines rugged reliability with unequalled optical performance and speed.
sentences.cn: 这款相机既坚固耐用，又有超凡的光学性能和快门速度。

sentences.en: The officers pulled him over after a high-speed chase.
sentences.cn: 警察们一路狂追后截住了他。

sentences.en: The train's average speed was no better than that of our bicycles.
sentences.cn: 火车的平均速度比我们骑自行车的速度快不了多少。

sentences.en: The truck was travelling at a speed of 50 mph.
sentences.cn: 卡车正以 50 英里的时速在行驶。

sentences.en: The vehicles have a top speed of 80 kilometres per hour.
sentences.cn: 这些车辆最高时速为80公里。

sentences.en: This new design will offer undreamed-of levels of comfort, safety and speed.
sentences.cn: 这种新设计将会给您带来意想不到的舒适、安全和快捷。

sentences.en: We can build up the speed gradually and safely.
sentences.cn: 我们可以逐渐稳妥地提高速度。

words.tran_cn: 快速行动的人或物；调节速度装置
冲,奔,急跑,飞跑,急速上升,飞逃,着魔似地奔跑
前进,进展,加快,推进,帮助,援助
超速，加速；加速，迅速前行；兴隆
加快…的速度；使成功，使繁荣

phrases.tran_cn: 旋转速度，转速；自旋马达之回转数
旋转速度，角速度；圆周速度
【非正式用语】 悉知的，熟悉的

trans.tran_en: the rate at which something moves or travels

trans.tran_cn: 加速，快速前行，超速驾驶
trans.tran_en: to be driving faster than the legal limit

trans.tran_cn: 飞驰，迅速前进，急行；加速；超速行驶
trans.tran_en: to be driving faster than the legal limit

trans.tran_cn: 快速传送； 促进， 使加速
trans.tran_en: to take someone or something somewhere very quickly
